name: RoboTraps
description: Death Trap Inc, the world's greatest provider of life-shortening technology, wants YOU! Remote-control our high-quality lethal products, solve challenging puzzles, and keep our 5 dim-witted working robots from accidentally destroying themselves. Apply now!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7.0 Processor: Intel Core i7-5500U Memory: 10 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) Storage: 802 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition
recommended_requirements: OS: 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i7-5500U Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition
